abstract: Facebook annoyances, Apple’s manifest destiny and an F.C.C. regulatory work-around top Thursday’s reading list.
snippet: Facebook annoyances, Apple’s manifest destiny and an F.C.C. regulatory work-around top Thursday’s reading list.
lead_paragraph: The announcement of a new OS for the iPhone and iPad did not suck all the air from the room. Here’s what the tech reporters and editors of the New York Times were reading Thursday:

headline.main: What We’re Reading: Regulation, Mobile Ads and Cartman
